Head: Dull occipital headache
Face blue
General confusion
Pupils dilated unequally
Spasmodic facial twitching
Vertigo with tendency to fall backward
Wants head low
Mind: Wants nothing to do with anybody
Urine: Constant desire; Very strong odor; deep yellow color
Chest: Irregular, tumultous action of heart can be heard in back
Mouth: Bites toungue; trembles; feels as if swollen and too large; protruding
Throat: Scalded sensation; as of a lump
